TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/CheckedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.CheckedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示包含列表视图控件中已选中项的索引的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection containing the indexes to the checked items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 索引存储到控件中的选中项 。A stores the indexes to the checked items in a control. 仅当 控件的属性设置为时，才能检查项 `true` 。Items can be checked only if the property of the control is set to `true`. 存储在中的索引 是内的索引位置 。The indexes stored in the are index positions within the . 存储显示在控件中的所有项 。The stores all items displayed in the control. 下表是如何 在示例控件中存储的项及其选中状态的示例 。The following table is an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their checked states in an example control. |索引Index|项Item|ListView 中的选中状态Checked state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-----------------------------------| |00|Item1Item1|未选中Unchecked| |11|Item2Item2|已选中Checked| |22|Item3Item3|未选中Unchecked| |33|Tuple.item4Item4|已选中Checked| |44|Tuple.item5Item5|已选中Checked| 根据 上表中的示例，下表演示了 将如何显示。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中选中项的索引Index of checked item in ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|-----------------------------------------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 您可以使用此类的属性和方法来使用集合执行各种任务。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 使用 方法可以确定中的索引位置是否 为中存储的索引之一 。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道该项位于集合中，就可以使用 方法确定索引在中的位置 。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，您可以确定中的索引位置是否 为存储在中的某个已选中索引 。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the checked indexes stored in the . 一旦知道项位于选中的索引集合中，就可以使用 方法确定索引在中的位置 。Once you know that an item is in the checked index collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定中选中项的数目 。This property enables you to determine the number of checked items in the . 然后，你可以在循环遍历集合的值时使用此值，并需要提供多个迭代来执行循环。You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop.
